der attack... again/Clash

gs a punch at Arrow's stomach...)

om: Soulstice Omega

uly 11, 2001 4:11 AM

r still waits for Arrow...)

nday, July 08, 2001 11:17 PM

 again/Clash


        Arrow looks at Stiller and then at Burning Hammer.

=
        Arrow: You take Perplex back inside.

        Burning Hammer nods a=
nd Arrow approaches Stiller...

ack... again/Clash

larger as he waits for Arrow...)

hivtrons under attack... again/Clash

     Sent: Saturday, July 07, 2001 8:05 PM
              Subject: Re: Chivt=
rons under attack... again/Clash


              STILLER





             =
 (Stiller smiles and puts his crossbow in it's holster. He clutches his fis=
ts and stares at Arrow.. He wanted a fist fight. Stiller motions for Arrow =
to come...)

                Arrow ducks the arr=
ow (heehee) and fires back 7 shots at Stiller...

riginal Message -----

                  =
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                  Sent: Saturday, July 07, 2001=
 5:17 AM
                  Subject: Re: Chivtrons under attack... again/Cla=
sh


                  MCGOWAN / BARRYMORE / STILLER / ALBA / VIRGO / LEE /=
 DEPP





                  (McGowan jumps over the 2 energy balls and fir=
es a missile at Nightlight.)



                  (Barrymore takes one of t=
he energy balls to the chest but dodges the other with a side jump. She fir=
es 6 laser beams at Nightlight.)



                  (Depp is struck by bo=
th energy balls, taking them in the left shoulder. Depp fires 7 shots at Ni=
ghtlight.)



                  (Alba ducks the energy balls and pulls a pi=
n from a grenade and throws it in front of the Chivtron base.)



         =
         (Stiller growls and fires an arrow at Arrow.)



                 =
 (Lee fires a ball of fire at Nightlight's legs, attempting to trip her up.=
)



                  (Virgo fires a red energy draining dart at Nightligh=
t...)

ghtlight::

                    Nightlight tried to defend herself, and dif=
iculty she could avoid the

nghold, She fired 2 energy balls to 
                    McGowan, 2 against=
 Barrymore, 2 agaisnt Alba, 2 against Depp, 2 
                    against =
Airbomber, 2 agaisnt Stranato and 2 against Stronghold. But 
              =
      she was hit by the combined attack of Barrymore and Stranato, doing 
=
                    her fell. 

                    She felt stunned and sh=
e would be defendless a short while.
